name: Shadowblight
description: A disease that causes the afflicted to be consumed by darkness, their skin turning black as shadows envelop their body.
antidote_description: A potent concoction brewed from the rare Lumina flowers that only bloom under the full moon. The elixir emits a radiant glow and, when consumed, floods the body with purifying light, banishing the shadows and restoring the natural hue of the skin.

name: Frostbane Fever
description: A chilling illness that lowers the body temperature drastically, causing frost to form on the skin and organs to freeze.
antidote_description: A warming potion made from the essence of fire blossoms. It raises the body temperature, melts the frost, and revitalizes the organs.

name: Wailing Plague
description: An infectious disease that causes the afflicted to uncontrollably wail in pain, spreading misery and despair.
antidote_description: A calming draught made from nightshade and lavender that soothes pain and silences the wails, bringing peace to the afflicted.

name: Cursed Blood
description: A curse that turns the blood into a dark, viscous liquid that poisons the body from within, causing severe pain and eventual death.
antidote_description: A powerful serum distilled from the hearts of unicorns, purifying the blood and neutralizing the poison.

name: Ethereal Consumption
description: A spectral illness that causes the afflicted to slowly fade into the ethereal plane, losing touch with reality.
antidote_description: A mystical tonic made from binding agents and ethereal dust, anchoring the afflicted back to the material plane.

name: Mindfire
description: A curse that inflames the mind, causing intense migraines and hallucinations.
antidote_description: A cooling elixir brewed from the leaves of the Frostmind plant, alleviating migraines and clearing hallucinations.

name: Boneshiver
description: An illness that causes the bones to become brittle and cold, making movement agonizing.
antidote_description: A fortifying brew made from dragon bone powder, strengthening and warming the bones.

name: Soulrot
description: A necrotic curse that slowly decays the soul, causing profound weakness and despair.
antidote_description: An essence made from the tears of phoenixes, healing and binding the soul, reversing necrosis.

name: Fleshweaver's Malady
description: A grotesque illness that warps the flesh, causing it to grow uncontrollably and painfully.
antidote_description: A thick ointment made from giant's tears and healing herbs, halting the growth and soothing the pain.

name: Eldritch Pox
description: A curse that marks the skin with arcane runes, draining the life force of the afflicted.
antidote_description: A salve made from arcane crystals and moonlit water, covering the runes and restoring life force.

name: Lich's Breath
description: An illness that causes the breath of the afflicted to become toxic, slowly killing them and those around them.
antidote_description: A detoxifying potion made from silverleaf and purified air, neutralizing the toxicity of the breath.

name: Cursed Tongue
description: A curse that renders the afflicted unable to speak without causing harm to themselves and others.
antidote_description: A syrup made from the nectar of whispering lilies, allowing the afflicted to speak without causing harm.

name: Fiend's Grasp
description: A demonic illness that causes the hands to transform into monstrous claws, uncontrollably attacking anything nearby.
antidote_description: A soothing potion made from calming herbs and demon's bane, reverting the hands back to normal.

name: Necrotic Whisper
description: A curse that fills the mind with necrotic whispers, driving the afflicted mad and causing their body to decay.
antidote_description: A potent elixir brewed from the essence of life and blessed waters, silencing the whispers and halting decay.
